about_the_game:
Detective Patch is a 2D side-scrolling detective RPG all about solving a wacky mystery and fighting all sorts of bizarre weirdos. On a cold and subdued night, a stranger in the dark steals the mayor’s precious ruby, a heirloom that holds immense power, and could possibly lead to the destruction of the world! Will Detective Patch (with the help of some odd allies) be able to find whodunnit before it’s too late?

Explore a giant plaza filled with all sorts of cool stuff to see and do! You can try to stay focused and solve the case as fast as you can, or relax and take the adventure at your own pace.

Fight a bunch of enemies with traditional turn-based combat, or use the unique interrogation system to deal with enemies without causing any harm.

Solve puzzles and mysteries with your trusty (and multipurpose) cluebook! Write down suspects and gather all sorts of evidence in this thing.

This demo features the opening acts of the game, and uncovering the first 2 suspects, spanning about an hour of total playtime.

Recommended:
  • OS: 10.13 High Sierra
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Quad-Core Intel Core i5
